page.title: 18PITFIRRANE GOLF COURSE
page.content: The course of just over 6000 yards is owned by Dunfermline Golf Club, and the yearly subscription to play on the Pitfirrane Golf course is Â£122 for men and Â£66 for women. Par for the course is 72, and the scratch standard is 70, but the course record is 64. While the Dunfermline golf Club was founded in 1867, it only moved to this site in 1953. A member of the club told us that the course is very good but takes alot of skill to perfect it.One bad feature of the course is that it can get very muddy in winter,but most of the year the ground is reasonable. The course is not too long and not too short, a good length, through a mixture of woodland and rolling open landscape, making the course very difficult even for the best of players.
